comment: A relationship between rank and ` R1 ` , clearly equivalent to ~ ssrankr1 and friends through trichotomy, but in Raph's opinion considerably more intuitive. See ~ rankr1b for the subset version. (Contributed by Raph Levien, 29-May-2004.)
